english.segment1: Take this world from me. I don't need it anymore. I am finally free. My heart is spoken for
english.segment2: Oh and I praise you. Oh and I worship you..
english.segment3: Chorus: Covered by your love divine. Child of the risen Lord. To hear you say "This one's mine". My heart is spoken for
english.segment4: Now I have a peace. I've never known before. I find myself complete. My heart is spoken for
english.segment5: Oh and I praise you. Oh and I worship you..
english.segment7: By the power of the cross. You've taken what was lost. And made it fully yours. And I have been redeemed. By you that spoke to me. Now I am spoken for
english.segment9: Take this world from me. Don't need it anymore..
